cards.calloutText:
BONUS: Lever Time Premium, our extended weekly podcast for supporting subscribers, features David's interview with journalist and author Joshua Frank about his new book Atomic Days: The Untold Story of the Most Toxic Place in America, about the Hanford Nuclear Reservation in Washington state.

To get access to Lever Time Premium and all of its bonus content, go here.

the collapse of the FTX exchange and resignation of its CEO

. David is joined by journalist and crypto policy expert Jacob Silverman, as well as director of research at the American Economic Liberties Project Matt Stoller, who explain the crypto debacle, why regulators were asleep at the wheel, and what should be done to fix the problem.
